TEI.2.document_title: Henry Smith to Stephen F Austin, 09-08-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Henry Smith to Austin, September 8, 1834. Notifying him of his election to the State congress.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1088
